pages.text: Soul Vultures are a bird undead creatures that it can be found in The Nether fossils.$(br2)They are hostile to playters, they steal the health of the player.$(br2)If a Soul Vulture sapping the player health 3 times, on death it was a 50% change of dropping a Soul Heart.
This can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/soulsteal)Potion of SoulSteal$(/l), as well used to attract $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/spectre)Spectres$(/l).
